**Government Tender Announcement**

## Title
6D063-225263 - **NextSeq 2000 and 1000 Sequencing Systems**

## Tender Reference Number
WS3795943105-Doc3797379895

## Tender Status
The tender for the supply and installation of NextSeq 2000 and 1000 sequencing systems has been expired.

## Background
The Public Health Agency of Canada (PHAC) intends to award a contract for goods and services to its pre-identified supplier, Illumina Canada Ulc. This notice provides interested suppliers an opportunity to demonstrate their capabilities and interest in bidding on this project.

## Procurement Details
*   **Contract Number:** WS3795943105
*   **Contract Type:** Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN)
*   **Contract Description:** The contract entails the delivery and installation of (2) next generation sequencing instrument systems, FOB destination (Winnipeg), on behalf of the National Microbiology Laboratory Branch (NMLB)'s Genomics Core. The Genomics Core will utilize these systems daily to generate data for PHAC mandate-essential activities to prevent and control infectious diseases.
*   **Contract Value:** The contract value is not specified.
*   **Delivery Dates:** The expected contract start date is January 20, 2023, and the expected contract end date is December 22, 2025.
*   **Regions of Opportunity:** Manitoba is the region of opportunity for this contract.

## Supporting Documents
A copy of the original tender solicitation notice can be accessed via [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14940277?extsite=MTQ5NDAyNzdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14940277?extsite=MTQ5NDAyNzdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==).
